summary: Hello, this is my first Skyrim Follower mod!! He is a Redguard stationed at Solitude having a drink in the winking Skeever.
descriptionHtml:
Hello, this is my first Skyrim Follower mod!! He is a Redguard stationed at Solitude having a drink in the winking Skeever. He levels with the player and is classed as a spellsword but will fight as a ranger until his bow is taken from him (reserve magic and all that). He does summon a wolf and has combat magic also some low level healing magic. If you have Aft, he will learn and use the new spells and whatever armor you give him.

Location: Solitude, Winking Skeever (At the bar)
Class: Spellsword / Ranger if you leave him with his bow
Level: Levels with the player
Marriagable and companion friendly
Uses what ever body and face textures you have

Showcased mods
Eyes of Beauty: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722
By LogRaam
Brows :https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411
By Ithot
Smooth faces for ladies and Gents: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1971
By pikkatze
Hi Res face Maps for males: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141
By Geonox
K ENB Pure Light at Skyrim: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58338
by KyoKushinoyama
Divine Elegance Store : https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81073
By Apachii

[size=2]For the modded version:
[/size][color=#fff2cc][size=2]The eyes of Beauty : https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722
By LogRaam
KS Hairdos- Renewal : https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311
By Kalilies[/size][/color]

The modded version is now up. Let me know if there are any problems. I did not test him much (On one or two hunts) because I was trying to work out his face, however, this is for people who do not want a custom faced follower but want there own skin, eye and hair mods to effect his face. Please upload any Screenshot so I can see him in action.

Thank you Jumarbye for your help in making this possible!!!
author: MateredDyn
